${ModID}:Distract.NAME: Distract
${ModID}:Distract.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL centandmys:Call a *Mystic card.

${ModID}:HexOfTheFrail.NAME: Hex of the Frail
${ModID}:HexOfTheFrail.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy cannot gain Block for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BreakingSlam.NAME: Breaking Slam
${ModID}:BreakingSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are centandmys:Infused, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:MysticEnergyChoice.NAME: Give it to the Mystic
${ModID}:MysticEnergyChoice.DESCRIPTION: The *Mystic gains [E] at the start of your turn.

${ModID}:CenturionEnergyChoice.NAME: Give it to the Centurion
${ModID}:CenturionEnergyChoice.DESCRIPTION: The *Centurion gains [E] at the start of your turn.

${ModID}:BlackVenomRitual.NAME: Black Venom Ritual
${ModID}:BlackVenomRitual.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|0=The enemy with the most centandmys:Venom loses HP equal to its centandmys:Venom.|1=ALL enemies lose HP equal to their centandmys:Venom.}

${ModID}:TranscendTheFlesh.NAME: Transcend The Flesh
${ModID}:TranscendTheFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Lose all *Temporary *HP. NL Gain 1 Strength for every 3 *Temporary *HP lost this way. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ConduitStrike.NAME: Conduit Strike
${ModID}:ConduitStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reapply all centandmys:Infuse effects that would be used by this attack.

${ModID}:Purify.NAME: Purify
${ModID}:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Your basic *Strikes and *Defends Exhaust when played.

${ModID}:FieldTactics.NAME: Field Tactics
${ModID}:FieldTactics.DESCRIPTION: centandmys:Call a *Mystic card. NL centandmys:Call a *Centurion card. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards.

${ModID}:Crush.NAME: Crush
${ModID}:Crush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage if you are not centandmys:Infused.

${ModID}:BlackMist.NAME: Black Mist
${ModID}:BlackMist.DESCRIPTION: Apply !centandmys:m2! centandmys:Venom and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Connection.NAME: Connection
${ModID}:Connection.DESCRIPTION: Lose all *Centurion and *Mystic energy. Gain that many [E].

${ModID}:StandStrong.NAME: Stand Strong
${ModID}:StandStrong.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards. If they are both *Mystic cards, gain Block equal to the intended damage of ALL enemies.

${ModID}:VisionsOfSnecko.NAME: Visions of Snecko
${ModID}:VisionsOfSnecko.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Randomize the cost of cards in your hand (between 0 and 2). NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Teamwork.NAME: Teamwork
${ModID}:Teamwork.DESCRIPTION: This turn, when you play a *Mystic or *Centurion card that costs 1 or more, centandmys:Call a card of the other type. Exhaust.

${ModID}:YourTurn.NAME: Your Turn
${ModID}:YourTurn.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Retain NL }Choose one : Lose all *Centurion [E] , gain that much *Mystic [E] and centandmys:Call a *Mystic card, or do the opposite.

${ModID}:YourTurnMystic.NAME: Your Turn, Mystic
${ModID}:YourTurnMystic.DESCRIPTION: Lose all *Centurion [E] , gain that much *Mystic [E] and centandmys:Call a *Mystic card.

${ModID}:YourTurnCenturion.NAME: Your Turn, Centurion
${ModID}:YourTurnCenturion.DESCRIPTION: Lose all *Mystic [E] , gain that much *Centurion [E] and centandmys:Call a *Centurion card.

${ModID}:Cohesion.NAME: Cohesion
${ModID}:Cohesion.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have no [E] of any type left, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:CrackGround.NAME: Crack Ground
${ModID}:CrackGround.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals !M! additional damage if your are not centandmys:Infused.

${ModID}:Assimilation.NAME: Assimilation
${ModID}:Assimilation.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you are centandmys:Infused, gain !M! *Temporary *HP.

${ModID}:DelayedHaste.NAME: Delayed Haste
${ModID}:DelayedHaste.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Add !M! *Haste cards to your hand.{!Upgrades!|<1= NL Exhaust.}

${ModID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${ModID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Choose one: centandmys:Call a *Centurion card or centandmys:Call a *Mystic card.{!Upgrades!|<1= NL Exhaust.}
